bibl.title: Strategos and exactor in the Fourth Century: One Office or Two?
bibl.note: After 309, and probably from 307/8, there was no separate office of strategos. Whether the title used is ἐξάκτωρ, στρατηγός or στρατηγὸς ἤτοι ἐξάκτωρ, only one and the same office is in question.
bibl.seg: THOMAS J. David, Strategos and exactor in the Fourth Century: One Office or Two?
After 309, and probably from 307/8, there was no separate office of strategos. Whether the title used is ἐξάκτωρ, στρατηγός or στρατηγὸς ἤτοι ἐξάκτωρ, only one and the same office is in question.
